item.title: Yell Command

item.description:
@shamu308 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("announce")) { String text = command.substring(8); yell(""+playerName+" [Donator]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Read full topic

item.title: Yell Command
item.dc:creator: @Skorge Skorge
item.description:
@Skorge wrote:

I really cant seem to get the [Donator] title for donators. this is what I have

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && !muted && playerRights == 0) {
String text = command.substring(5);

			yell("[@whi@Player@bla@]"+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

} else { if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && !muted && playerRights >= 1) {
String text = command.substring(5);

			yell("[@blu@Staff@bla@]"+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

} else { if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && !muted && donator == 1) {
String text = command.substring(5);

			yell("[@gre@Donator@bla@]"+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

} else { if (command.startsWith(“message”) && command.length() > 8 && !muted && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Ryan”)) {
String text = command.substring(8);

			yell("" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

}
}
}
}[/code]

Whenever I use a Donor character it just stays at the [Player] Title.

Read full topic
